text: Bissières is a former commune. It is found in the Normandy region in the Calvados department in the northwest of France. On 1 January 2017, it was merged into the new commune of Méry-Bissières-en-Auge.Arrêté préfectoral 8 September 2016 ==Population== == References == Category:Former communes in Calvados
title: Bissières
